attributes.action: End the unfairness against the British marrying foreign national rules when it doesn't apply to EU residents living here
attributes.additional_details: If you are a British Citizen and marry a non-european, your spouse is unable to come to England and live with you unless you earns £18,600.  This rule does not apply to any other EU citizen.  ie.  British person marries an Australian and earns £15,000 a year, their spouse is not entitled to settle here.  If say a Polish/German/Spanish etc etc person earns £15,000 and marry's an Australian their spouse can settle here.  Is this fair!!  I think not.  The British people are getting descriminated against in their own country.  We need to stand up and unite.  The same rule needs to be the same for everyone.
